content: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

content: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

content: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

content: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

content: Get busy living or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King

content: Maybe home is not a place but simply an irrevocable condition.
author: James Baldwin

content: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

content: An unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

content: When one door of happiness closes, another opens, but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us.
author: Helen Keller

content: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers
